paragraph: because it concerns the sexual or creating libido. When, through the actual preparation of fire, the sexual character of the libido employed in that is fulfilled, then the mouth zone remains without adequate expression; only the hand has now reached its real, purely human goal in its first art.
question: How is the concept of the "sexual or creating libido" related to the development of art, according to the given text?
answer: The concept of the "sexual or creating libido" is related to the development of art in that, when it is fully expressed through actions like preparing fire, it leads to the hand reaching its true, purely human goal in the first form of art, while the mouth zone remains without adequate expression.
